location.address: Rua Eupideo Alves do Nascimento, 104 , Governador Celso Ramos, CEP 88190-000, Brazil

descriptions.description:
Incorporated in the same ambience, two-storeys, offers a generous living room area and a bedroom with a clean style decoration and a double bed. With approximately 80 square meters, the environment is functional, light, airy and cozy. Enjoy the two decks with the Emerald Coast view.

* We host children over 14 years old only on special occasions such as Mother’s and Father’s Day and Christmas. We do not accept pets.

Integrados en un mismo ambiente, dos niveles incluyen una sala amplia y una habitación con decoración clean y cama matrimonial. Con aproximadamente 80 m², el ambiente es funcional, liviano y ventilado sin perder la calidez. Disfrute aún de dos decks con vista hacia el mar de la Costa Esmeralda.

* Recibimos niños mayores de 14 años solo en fechas especiales como el Día de la Madre y el Día del Padre y Navidad. No aceptamos mascotas.

Integrados em um mesmo ambiente, dois níveis comportam uma ampla sala e quarto com decoração clean e cama de casal. Com aproximadamente 80m², o ambiente é funcional, leve e arejado sem perder o aconchego. Desfrute ainda de dois decks com vista para o mar da Costa Esmeralda.

*Recebemos crianças acima de 14 anos apenas em datas especiais como
Dia das Mães e Pais e Natal. Não aceitamos pets.

Recently renovated, Arvoredo bungalows feature a private heated pool, as well as a dry sauna. With approximately 96 square meters, there is a bedroom and living room on the same level, separated into two ambiences: a living room – ideal for reading or watching a good movie, and the bedroom – comfortable and cozy with a closet and a spacious bathroom.

* We host children over 14 years old only on special occasions such as Mother’s and Father’s Day and Christmas. We do not accept pets.

Recien reformados, los bungalows de la categoría Arvoredo poseen piscina privada y climatizada en su interior, así como sauna seca. Con aproximadamente 96 m², el ambiente posee habitación y sala en un mismo nivel, separados en dos ambientes: la sala, ideal para lectura o televisión. Ya el cuarto, cómodo y acogedor, además de un closet con un espacioso baño.

* Recibimos niños mayores de 14 años solo en fechas especiales como el Día de la Madre y el Día del Padre y Navidad. No aceptamos mascotas.

Recém reformados, os bangalôs de categoria Arvoredo apresentam piscina privativa e climatizada em seu interior bem como sauna seca. Com aproximadamente 96m², o ambiente possui quarto e sala em um mesmo nível, separados em dois ambientes: a sala, ideal para leitura ou um bom filme. Já o quarto, confortável e aconchegante, seguido do closet e de um espaçoso banheiro.

*Recebemos crianças acima de 14 anos apenas em datas especiais como Dia das Mães e Pais e Natal. Não aceitamos pets.

Recently renovated and with approximately 180 square meters, this bungalow features an integrated bedroom and living room into a single modern and exclusive ambience. The clean decoration brings light and sophistication even in the smallest details. Extra touches include 600-thread Egyptian cotton sheets. The lighting has been designed to bring guests into a unique contact with nature. The outside area is a generous wooden balcony with an extraordinary view of the whole Emerald Coast. From there you can see from the little island in front of the bungalow until the fishing village of Ganchos do Meio – and the sunset is unforgettable!

* We host children over 14 years old only on special occasions such as Mother’s and Father’s Day and Christmas. We do not accept pets.

Recién reformado y con aproximadamente 180m², el bungalow ofrece habitación y sala integrados en un ambiente moderno y exclusivo. La decoración clean deja marcado una suavidad y sofisticación en los pequeños detalles. Toques extras incluyen sábanas de algodón egipcio 600 hilos. La iluminación fue proyectada para brindarle al huésped un contacto único con la naturaleza. En el área externa, un balcón amplio de madera con una vista increíble de toda la Costa Esmeralda. Es posible observar desde la isleta al frente de la playa hasta la villa de pescadores de los Ganchos do Meio. La puesta del sol es imperdible.

* Recibimos niños mayores de 14 años solo en fechas especiales como el Día de la Madre y el Día del Padre y Navidad. No aceptamos mascotas.

Recém reformado e com aproximadamente 180m², o bangalô oferece quarto e sala integrados em um ambiente moderno e exclusivo. A decoração clean imprime leveza e sofisticação nos pequenos detalhes. Toques extras incluem lençóis de algodão egípcio 600 fios. A iluminação foi projetada para proporcionar ao hóspede um contato único com a natureza. Na área externa, uma ampla sacada de madeira com uma vista incrível de toda a Costa Esmeralda. É possível enxergar desde a ilhota em frente à praia até a vila de pescadores dos Ganchos do Meio, o pôr do sol é imperdível.

*Recebemos crianças acima de 14 anos apenas em datas especiais como Dia das Mães e Pais e Natal. Não aceitamos pets.

Recently renovated, Da Vila bungalow offers a modern fully integrated and functional space, which provides guests with comfort and convenience. It has a double bathroom, dry sauna and a whirlpool surrounded by glass doors and by a glass ceiling, offering beautiful natural light. The pretty garden frames a delightful infinity pool, which is the ideal place to appreciate the beauty of nature and the truly splendid sunset.

* We host children over 14 years old only on special occasions such as Mother’s and Father’s Day and Christmas. We do not accept pets.

Recién reformada, la categoría Da Vila ofrece ambiente moderno, integrado y funcional para que el huésped tenga toda la comodidad y conveniencia. Dispone de baño duplo, sauna seca y una bañera de hidromasajes cercada por puertas y tejado de vidrio, permitiendo una gran iluminación natural. El hermoso jardín rodea una deliciosa piscina desbordante ideal para vivenciar la naturaleza y una hermosísima puesta del sol.

* Recibimos niños mayores de 14 años solo en fechas especiales como el Día de la Madre y el Día del Padre y Navidad. No aceptamos mascotas.

Recém reformada, a categoria Da Vila oferece ambiente moderno, integrado e funcional para o hóspede ter todo conforto e comodidade. Dispõe de banheiro duplo, sauna seca e uma hidromassagem cercada por portas e telhado de vidro, permitindo uma grande iluminação natural. O belo jardim emoldura uma deliciosa piscina de fundo infinito ideal para vivenciar a natureza e o belíssimo pôr do sol.

*Recebemos crianças acima de 14 anos apenas em datas especiais como Dia das Mães e Pais e Natal. Não aceitamos pets.

Recently renovated, the Esmeralda Bungalow, with approximately 230 square meters features a bedroom and a living room in a fully integrated area, separated from the outside area by an extensive glass door. The ambience includes a dry sauna with ocean view, a spa bathroom and a whirlpool that also has an ocean view, and a cozy fireplace for the cold days. In the delightful and charming external area, there is a private deck with comfortable Chaise Longues and a heated pool. Extra touches include 600-thread Egyptian cotton sheets and a wine cellar.

* We host children over 14 years old only on special occasions such as Mother’s and Father’s Day and Christmas. We do not accept pets.

Recién reformado, el Bungalow Esmeralda, con aproximadamente 230 m², ofrece habitación y sala totalmente integrados y separados del área externa por una extensa puerta de vidrio. El ambiente incluye sauna seca con vista al mar, un baño spa, bañera de hidromasajes también con vista al mar y una agradable chimenea para los días de frío. Una deliciosa y hermosa área externa, deck privado con confortables Chaise Longues y una piscina climatizada. Toques extras incluyen sábanas de algodón egipcio 600 hilos y bodega para vinos.

* Recibimos niños mayores de 14 años solo en fechas especiales como el Día de la Madre y el Día del Padre y Navidad. No aceptamos mascotas.

Recém reformado, o Bangalô Esmeralda, com aproximadamente 230m², oferece quarto e sala totalmente integrados e separados da área externa por uma extensa porta de vidro. O ambiente inclui sauna seca com vista para o mar, um banheiro-spa, hidromassagem também com vista mar e uma aconchegante lareira para os dias de frio. Na deliciosa e charmosa área externa, deck privativo com confortáveis Chaise Longues e uma piscina climatizada. Toques extras incluem lençóis de algodão egípcio 600 fios e adega para vinhos.

*Recebemos crianças acima de 14 anos apenas em datas especiais como Dia das Mães e Pais e Natal. Não aceitamos pets.

The Especial Esmeralda is the most exclusive bungalow in the resort, providing the guests with a unique experience without ever having to leave the bungalow. Recently renovated, the bedroom and the living room are completely integrated, separated from the external area by an extensive glass door, resulting in perfect natural lighting, allowing guests to enjoy the breathtaking view without even getting out of bed or up from the cozy and welcoming sofa. It also features a sauna facing the ocean, a spa bathroom with tatamis for massages and a whirlpool, which also offers an ocean view. Still inside the bungalow, on the lower floor, there is a private fitness center. In the external area there is a private deck with comfortable Chaise Longues and a heated infinity pool. Extra touches include 600-thread Egyptian cotton sheets and a wine cellar.

* We host children over 14 years old only on special occasions such as Mother’s and Father’s Day and Christmas. We do not accept pets.

Por ser la acomodación más exclusiva, el Especial Esmeralda ofrece al huésped una increíble experiencia sin necesidad de salir del bungalow. Recién reformado, cuenta con dormitorio y sala totalmente integrados y separados del área externa por una extensa puerta de vidrio, lo que permite una perfecta iluminación natural, el huésped aprecia la vista, maravillosa sin salir de la cama o del agradable sofá. El ambiente todavía posee sauna con vista al mar y un baño spa con tatamis para masaje y bañera de hidromasajes, también con vista al mar. Aún por dentro del bungalow, en el piso inferior, un fitness center privado. En el área externa, deck privado con cómodos Chaise Longues y una piscina climatizada desbordante. Toques extras incluyen sábanas de algodón egipcio de 600 hilos y bodega de vinos.

* Recibimos niños mayores de 14 años solo en fechas especiales como el Día de la Madre y el Día del Padre y Navidad. No aceptamos mascotas.

Por ser a acomodação mais exclusiva, o Especial Esmeralda proporciona ao hóspede uma incrível experiência sem precisar sair do bangalô. Recém reformado, conta com quarto e sala totalmente integrados e separados da área externa por uma extensa porta de vidro, o que permite uma perfeita iluminação natural, o hóspede aprecia a vista deslumbrante sem sair da cama ou do aconchegante sofá. O ambiente possui ainda sauna com vista para o mar e um banheiro-spa com tatames para massagem e hidromassagem, também vista mar. Ainda dentro do bangalô, no andar inferior, um fitness center privativo. Na área externa, deck privativo com confortáveis Chaise Longues e uma piscina climatizada de borda infinita. Toques extras incluem lençóis de algodão egípcio 600 fios e adega para vinhos.

*Recebemos crianças acima de 14 anos apenas em datas especiais como
Dia das Mães e Pais e Natal. Não aceitamos pets.

With approximately 96 square meters, the Anhatomirim Special category bungalows feature a bedroom and a living room in two-storeys, deck with a private heated pool, as well as a solarium and a dry sauna.

* We host children over 14 years old only on special occasions such as Mother’s and Father’s Day and Christmas. We do not accept pets.

Con aproximadamente 96 m², los bungalows de categoría Especial Anhatomirim cuentan en dos niveles con un dormitorio y una sala de estar, una terraza con una piscina privada climatizada, así como un solárium y una sauna seca.

*Recibimos niños mayores de 14 años solo en fechas especiales como
el Día de la Madre y el Día del Padre y Navidad. No aceptamos mascotas.

Com aproximadamente 96m², os bangalôs de categoria Especial Anhatomirim apresentam em dois níveis quarto e sala, deck com piscina privativa e climatizada além de solarium e sauna seca.

*Recebemos crianças acima de 14 anos apenas em datas especiais como
Dia das Mães e Pais e Natal. Não aceitamos pets.

result.Title: EXCLUSIVE EXPERIENCES IN AN IDYLLIC SCENARIO
result.Description:
Ponta dos Ganchos Exclusive Resort is a reference in luxury hospitality in Brazil and stands out for its excellence in services and sophistication in the details.

 

Located on a private peninsula in the city of Governador Celso Ramos, 60 km from Florianópolis, Ponta dos Ganchos Exclusive Resort is surrounded by a fishing village and is immersed in lush nature. It’s a trimmed peninsula that form coves where nature has acted capriciously, with an aura of romance provided by the most authentic tranquility and privacy.

With a privileged location, the resort is within a short flight distance from São Paulo, Rio de Janeiro and Buenos Aires. The green of the mountains seems to merge with the Esmeralda Coast clear water, north of Santa Catarina. Three small islands and a white sand bay make the scenery even more charming.

One of the main characteristics of Ponta dos Ganchos is its exclusivity. In an area of 80 thousand square meters, there are only 25 bungalows, and they are divided into seven categories, from 80 square meters to 310 square meters. All of them are designed for up to two people and provide a stunning view of the Emerald Coast. Most of them feature heated swimming pools and dry sauna. In some categories, the bungalows even provide whirlpools, in addition to other facilities.

The resort also provides a cuisine recognized for being based on classic gastronomy combined with contemporary techniques and the search for the valorization of Brazilian regional cuisine.

Ponta dos Ganchos Spa by Sisley, a true oasis in the midst of nature, offers an official Sisley body and facial treatments’ menu, in three tents with a stunning view to the Emerald Coast.

In addition to the facilities, the resort also offers its experiences’ menu, which will further enrich your stay with us.

Browse our website and find out more about Ponta dos Ganchos Exclusive Resort.

descriptions.description:
Ponta dos Ganchos Exclusive Resort is a reference in luxury hospitality in Brazil and stands out for its excellence in services and sophistication in the details. 

Located on a private peninsula in the city of Governador Celso Ramos, 60 km from Florianópolis, Ponta dos Ganchos Exclusive Resort is surrounded by a fishing village and is immersed in lush nature. It’s a trimmed peninsula that form coves where nature has acted capriciously, with an aura of romance provided by the most authentic tranquility and privacy.

With a privileged location, the resort is within a short flight distance from São Paulo, Rio de Janeiro and Buenos Aires. The green of the mountains seems to merge with the Esmeralda Coast clear water, north of Santa Catarina. Three small islands and a white sand bay make the scenery even more charming.

One of the main characteristics of Ponta dos Ganchos is its exclusivity. In an area of 80 thousand square meters, there are only 25 bungalows, and they are divided into seven categories, from 80 square meters to 310 square meters. All of them are designed for up to two people and provide a stunning view of the Emerald Coast. Most of them feature heated swimming pools and dry sauna. In some categories, the bungalows even provide whirlpools, in addition to other facilities.

The resort also provides a cuisine recognized for being based on classic gastronomy combined with contemporary techniques and the search for the valorization of Brazilian regional cuisine.

Ponta dos Ganchos Spa by Sisley, a true oasis in the midst of nature, offers an official Sisley body and facial treatments’ menu, in three tents with a stunning view to the Emerald Coast.

In addition to the facilities, the resort also offers its experiences’ menu, which will further enrich your stay with us.

Ponta dos Ganchos Exclusive Resort es referencia en hotelería de lujo en Brasil y se destaca por la excelencia en servicios y sofisticación en los detalles.

Ubicado en una península privada en la ciudad de Governador Celso Ramos, a 60km de Florianópolis, Ponta dos Ganchos Exclusive Resort está rodeado por una villa de pescadores y está inmerso en una naturaleza exuberante. Una península de recortes que forman ensenadas donde la naturaleza actuó con capricho, con un clima de romance ofrecido por la más auténtica tranquilidad y privacidad.

Con una ubicación privilegiada, el resort queda a poca distancia de San Pablo, Río de Janeiro y Buenos Aires. El verde de las montañas parece unirse a las aguas claras del mar de la Costa Esmeralda, al Norte de Santa Catarina. Tres pequeñas islas y una bahía de arena blanca convierten el escenario aún más encantador.

Una de las principales características de Ponta dos Ganchos es la exclusividad. En un área de 80 mil m² están ubicados apenas 25 Bungalows, divididos en siete categorías, entre 80 m² y 310 m². Todos ellos reciben hasta dos personas y ofrecen una admirable vista al mar de la Costa Esmeralda. En su mayoría con piscinas climatizadas y sauna seca. En algunas categorías, los bungalows ofrecen todavía bañera de hidromasajes, además de otras facilidades.

El resort también presenta una gastronomía reconocida por tener como base la culinaria clásica aliada a técnicas contemporáneas y la búsqueda por la valoración de la culinaria regional brasileña.

Ponta dos Ganchos Spa by Sisley, un verdadero oasis en medio de la naturaleza, ofrece un menú de tratamientos corporales y faciales de la marca Sisley, en tres tiendas con linda vista al mar de la Costa Esmeralda.

Además de la estructura de todo el resort, en el menú de servicios el resort todavía ofrece experiencias adicionales que van a marcar aún más su estancia con nosotros.

O Ponta dos Ganchos Exclusive Resort é referência em hotelaria de luxo no Brasil e se destaca pela excelência em serviços e a sofisticação nos detalhes.

Localizado em uma península particular na cidade de Governador Celso Ramos, a 60 km de Florianópolis, o Ponta dos Ganchos Exclusive Resort é rodeado por uma vila de pescadores e está imerso a uma natureza exuberante. Uma península de recortes que formam enseadas onde a natureza agiu caprichosamente, com um clima de romance proporcionado pela mais autêntica tranquilidade e privacidade.

Com uma localização privilegiada, o resort fica a uma curta distância de São Paulo, Rio de Janeiro e Buenos Aires. O verde das montanhas parece se unir às águas claras do mar da Costa Esmeralda, ao norte de Santa Catarina. Três pequenas ilhas e uma baía de areia branca tornam o cenário ainda mais encantador.

Uma das principais características do Ponta dos Ganchos é a exclusividade. Em uma área de 80 mil m² estão localizados apenas 25 bangalôs, divididos em sete categorias, entre 80 m² e 310 m². Todos eles recebem até duas pessoas e proporcionam uma deslumbrante vista para o mar da Costa Esmeralda. Em sua maioria com piscinas climatizadas e sauna seca. Em algumas categorias, os bangalôs ainda oferecem hidromassagem, além de outras facilidades.

O resort também apresenta uma gastronomia reconhecida por ter como base a culinária clássica aliada a técnicas contemporâneas e a busca pela valorização da culinária regional brasileira.

O Ponta dos Ganchos Spa by Sisley, um verdadeiro oásis em meio à natureza, oferece um menu de tratamentos corporais e faciais oficiais da marca Sisley, em três tendas com a linda vista do mar da Costa Esmeralda.

Além da estrutura, o hotel oferece em seu menu de serviços experiências adicionais que vão deixar a sua estada ainda mais especial.

descriptions.description: Poseidonion Grand Hotel, which first opened in 1914, was the brainchild of Sotirios Anargyros, a visionary benefactor who was responsible for much of Spetses’ development. Furthermore, it represented the cosmopolitan face of the island and soon became one of its famous landmarks, a favourite destination for high society, royalty and wealthy Athenians.

location.address: Vicolo Marzio,1 (Piazza Del Pesce), Uffizi, 50122 Florence, Italy

rooms.name: Superior Double Room with Spa Bath

descriptions.description:
he Hotel Hermitage is magnificently located in downtown Florence, overlooking the Ponte Vecchio, with only a pleasant stroll separating the Pitti Palace and Uffizi Gallery from the rooms at your charming hotel.
All the leading museums and art galleries in Florence are within easy reach of the Hotel Hermitage, like the acclaimed Piazza della Signoria and Boboli Gardens, a brilliant example of Italian gardens and the city's traditional park.

The main shopping streets - especially Via de` Tornabuoni and Via della Vigna Nuova - with great boutiques and splendid leather goods, are just a 5-minute walk away from the hotel while you can't miss the nearby age-old gold and jewelry stands on Ponte Vecchio. Those traveling to Florence on business will be pleased to know that the Fortezza da Basso and its leading and modern Convention Center are only 2 km from the Hotel Hermitage.

El Hotel Hermitage se encuentra en una magnífica ubicación en el centro histórico de Florencia, con vistas al Ponte Vecchio, muy cerca de Palazzo Pitti y de la Galleria degli Uffizi, accesible con un sugerente paseo desde las habitaciones de su hotel con encanto.
Desde el Hotel Hermitage, todos los principales museos y galerías de arte de Florencia están al alcance de la mano, como la célebre Piazza della Signoria y el Giardino di Boboli, brillante ejemplo de jardín de estilo italiano y parque histórico de la ciudad.

5 minutos a pie desde el hotel lo separan de los principales itinerarios de compras - principalmente, Via de` Tornabuoni y Via della Vigna Nuova - con espléndidas boutiques y tiendas de preciadas peleterías, mientras que, en las inmediaciones del hotel, son imprescindibles los antiguos talleres de orfebrería de Ponte Vecchio. Los que están en viaje de negocios en Florencia se alegrarán de saber que la Fortezza da Basso y su prestigioso y moderno Centro de Congresos están a solo 2 km del Hotel Hermitage.

rooms.name: Single Room
descriptions: The single rooms are all unique: up to 25 m² in size, with bathroom or shower and toilet. Lovingly furnished with sofa chairs and coffee table, they invite individualists to stay. Bathroom, shower and toilet Minibar Heating Bathrobe, hair dryer, bath bag Safe Phone DVD player, TV, WIFI

rooms.name: Double Room
descriptions: Relax in the comfortable seating area and enjoy your room from 26 m² to 34 m², or make yourself comfortable in the spacious double bed. Some rooms have a private balcony for sunbathing. All double rooms have a private bathroom with tub and toilet. Lounge partly private balcony own bathroom, tub and toilet Stereo, safe, telephone, DVD player, TV, WIFI Bath bag, bathrobe, hair dryer

rooms.name: Hunters Lodge
descriptions: The “hunter’s rooms”, all with a bathroom with tub, are particularly popular. They stay on 35 m²,hunting motifs and noble rustic furniture create a very special atmosphere. These spacious living-bedrooms are partly equipped with tiled stoves or balconies. Living bedroom with double bed and living area Bathroom with tub, classy rustic furniture, flat TV, safe and hair dryer Hunting motifs adorn the walls and invite you to stay partly with balcony or tiled stove.

descriptions.description: Immerse yourself in the new “Post Beauty & Spa” wellness oasis for body and soul. Here you have a professional team for your very personal pampering program at your disposal.

rooms.name: Intracoastal Room
descriptions: The Intracoastal Rooms at our luxury Miami Beach resort face west looking out to Collins Avenue and are perfect for a luxurious couples’ getaway. Each room features a king-size bed, modern Italian design sofa sleeper, signature style wingback club chair, smoked glass and bronze metal coffee tables, dresser and desk with bronze glass inlay, desk with ergonomic chair and integrated media connectivity, high-definition TV, private bar, private balcony, and private bathroom with marble flooring, double sinks, Jacuzzi whirlpool tub and glass-enclosed couples shower. The rooms measure 740 sq. ft. (with 69 sq. mt. balcony) and 600 sq. ft. (enclosed room space).

rooms.name: Deluxe Intracoastal Room
descriptions: The Deluxe Intracoastal Rooms in our luxury Miami Beach resort are perfect for a luxurious couples’ getaway. They offer premium Intracoastal Waterway views, a king-size bed, modern Italian design sofa sleeper, signature style wingback club chair, smoked glass and bronze metal coffee tables, dresser and desk with bronze glass inlay, desk with ergonomic desk chair and integrated media connectivity, high-definition TV, private balcony, and private bathroom with marble flooring, double sinks, Jacuzzi whirlpool tub and glass-enclosed couples shower. The rooms measure 740 sq. ft. (with 69 sq. mt. balcony) and 600 sq. ft. (enclosed room space).

rooms.name: Intracoastal Room with 2 double beds
descriptions: The Intracoastal Room with 2 double beds in our luxury Miami Beach resort are perfect for a luxurious couples’ getaway. They offer premium Intracoastal Waterway views, a king-size bed, modern Italian design sofa sleeper, signature style wingback club chair, smoked glass and bronze metal coffee tables, dresser and desk with bronze glass inlay, desk with ergonomic desk chair and integrated media connectivity, high-definition TV, private balcony, and private bathroom with marble flooring, double sinks, Jacuzzi whirlpool tub and glass-enclosed couples shower. The rooms measure 740 sq. ft. (with 69 sq. mt. balcony) and 600 sq. ft. (enclosed room space).

rooms.name: Classic Suite
descriptions: Floors 18 to 21. Bathtub and Glass-Enclosed Couples Shower.The spacious one-bedroom oceanfront Classic Suites at our luxury 5-star hotel in Miami are perfect for a luxurious couples’ getaway. They feature a king-size bed, separate living room, modern Italian design sofa sleeper, signature style wingback club chairs, smoked glass and bronze metal coffee tables, writing desk and ergonomic desk chair, dining chairs, taupe lacquer dresser with integrated media connectivity, two high-definition TV’s, private dining balcony, and spacious 185-sq.-ft. bathroom with imported marble flooring, double sinks, custom vanity area, bathtub and glass-enclosed couples’ shower. The suites measure 1180 sq. ft. (with 110 sq. mt. balcony) and 1010 sq. ft (enclosed room space).

rooms.name: One Bedroom Oceanfront Suite
descriptions: Floors 5 to 17.Separate Living Room.Gourmet Kitchen.Our One-Bedroom Oceanfront Suites are perfect for a couples getaway. They feature an breathtaking oceanfront view, a king-size bed, separate living room, modern Italian design sofa sleeper, credenza with integrated media connectivity, club chairs, smoked glass and bronze metal coffee tables, dresser and desk with bronze glass inlay, desk and ergonomic desk chair, high-definition TVs, private bar, sitting area, private balcony, full gourmet kitchen with built-in Sub-Zero refrigerator/freezer and Italian cabinets (including designer granite countertops with full back splash, microwave, dishwasher, stainless steel sink and garbage disposal), breakfast room, and a powder room. The suite also features a convertible den with a writing desk and twin bed. The main bathroom measures 220 sq. ft. and is outfitted with imported marble flooring, double sinks, custom vanity area, Jacuzzi whirlpool tub and glass-enclosed couples shower. The suite measures 1660 sq. ft. (with 154 sq. mt. balcony) and 1430 sq. ft. (enclosed room space).

rooms.name: Deluxe Oceanfront One Bedroom Suite
descriptions: Floors 22 to 28.Separate Living Room.Gourmet Kitchen.Our Deluxe One-Bedroom Oceanfront Suites are perfect for a couples getaway. They feature a premium oceanfront view of the Atlantic, a bedroom with king bed, a twin-size day bed, a separate living room, modern Italian design sofa sleeper, a credenza with integrated media connectivity, club chairs, smoked glass and bronze metal coffee tables, a dresser and desk with bronze glass inlay, a desk and ergonomic desk chair, signature style wingback club chair and ottoman, high-definition TVs, private bar, sitting area, private balcony, full gourmet kitchen with built-in Sub-Zero refrigerator/freezer and Italian cabinets (including designer granite countertops with full back splash, microwave, dishwasher, stainless steel sink and garbage disposal), and breakfast room. The main bathroom measures 220 sq. ft. and is outfitted with imported marble flooring, double sinks, custom vanity area, Jacuzzi whirlpool tub, and glass-enclosed couples shower. The suite measures 1660 sq. ft. (with 154 sq. mt. balcony) and 1430 sq. ft. (enclosed room space).

rooms.name: Two Bedroom Oceanfront Suite
descriptions: Floors 5 to 17.Separate Living Room.Gourmet Kitchen.Our Two-Bedroom Oceanfront Suites are perfect for a couples or family getaway. Thy feature a master bedroom and second bedroom with king beds, a separate living room, modern Italian design sofa sleeper, taupe lacquer credenza with integrated media connectivity, smoked glass and bronze metal coffee tables, dresser and desk with bronze glass inlay, desk and ergonomic desk chair, high-definition TVs, an entertainment center, sitting area, private terrace, full gourmet kitchen with built-in Sub-Zero refrigerator/freezer and Italian cabinets (including designer granite countertops with full back splash, microwave, dishwasher, stainless steel sink and garbage disposal), breakfast room, powder room and two full bathrooms outfitted with imported marble flooring, double sinks, custom vanity area, bathtub and glass-enclosed couples shower. The suite also features a convertible den with a writing desk and twin bed. The bedrooms are arranged so the master bedroom offers oceanfront views and the second bedroom offers Intracoastal views. The suite measures 2,379 sq. ft. (with 221 sq. mt. balcony) and 2,035 sq. ft. (enclosed room space).

rooms.name: Deluxe Two Bedroom Oceanfront Suite
descriptions: Floors 22 to 28.Two Bedrooms with King Beds.Large Living Room.Gourmet Kitchen.Our Deluxe Two-Bedroom Oceanfront Suites are perfect for a couples or family getaway. They feature king beds in both the master and second bedroom, premium oceanfront views, twin day bed, separate living room, modern Italian design sofa sleeper, taupe lacquer credenza with integrated media connectivity, signature style wingback club chair and ottoman, smoked glass and bronze metal coffee tables, dresser and desk with bronze glass inlay, desk and ergonomic desk chair, high-definition TVs, entertainment center, sitting area, private balcony, full gourmet kitchen with built-in Sub-Zero refrigerator/freezer and Italian cabinets (including designer granite countertops with full backsplash, microwave, dishwasher, stainless steel sink, and garbage disposal), breakfast room, and two full bathrooms outfitted with imported marble flooring, double sinks, custom vanity area, bathtub and glass-enclosed couples shower. The bedrooms are arranged so the master bedroom offers oceanfront views and the second bedroom offers Intracoastal views. The suite measures 2,379 sq. ft. (with 221 sq. mt. balcony) and 2,035 sq. ft. (enclosed room space).

rooms.name: Deluxe Three Bedroom Oceanfront Suite
descriptions: Floors 31 and 35.Two King-Size Beds.One Bedroom with Two Twin Beds.Large Living Room.Gourmet Kitchen.Acqualina features two Deluxe Three-Bedroom Oceanfront Suites offering an oasis of elegance and comfort. These spacious Miami hotel suites are ideal for discerning luxury travelers and upscale couples or family getaways.    Both Deluxe Three-Bedroom Oceanfront Suites feature three bathrooms and private balconies with stunning views of the Atlantic Ocean. Each suite is equipped with a large living room, modern Italian design sofa sleeper, taupe lacquer credenza with integrated media connectivity, smoked glass and bronze metal coffee tables, signature style wingback club chairs and ottomans, ergonomic desk chairs, two sitting spaces including a media area with a high-definition TV, a reading area with custom-built sofas, a writing desk, and a wine bar station. The kitchens are full gourmet with built-in Sub-Zero refrigerator/freezer, designer granite countertops, microwave, dishwasher, and stainless steel sink. The dining area seats six people and features prominent bay windows and floor-to-ceiling ocean views.

rooms.name: Grand Deluxe Three Bedroom Oceanfront Suite
descriptions: Floor 32.King-Size Bed.Queen-Size Bed.Two Twin Beds.Large Living Room.Gourmet Kitchen.Our Grand Deluxe Three-Bedroom Oceanfront Suite is a one-of-a-kind accommodation with the breathtaking Atlantic Ocean views. The suite’s elegant styling and contemporary glamour carries the magnificent ocean grandeur throughout the interior design with its luxurious contemporary fabrics, soothing color palette, and marble floors.The elegant entry foyer features chic marble flooring and has round mirrored sconces, linear polished nickel light fixtures, and hand-painted wallpaper. The suite’s expansive living room features modern geometric patterned end tables, a 65-inch 4K TV, and a flush mount chandelier. Elegant drapery adorns the floor-to-ceiling window. The sitting area has a queen sleeper sofa with quilted back cushions and accented pillows, antique brass coffee table, and an area rug. There is also a serene gathering area with a sleek writing desk and four lounge chairs.The full gourmet kitchen features designer Arctic white quartz countertops with full backsplash, a built-in Sub-Zero refrigerator/freezer, microwave, dishwasher, and stainless steel sink. The dining area features a Ralph Lauren Baxter metal shade chandelier, bay window with floor-to-ceiling ocean views, two bar stools, and a four-person dining table.There are three bedroom options - an oceanfront master bedroom with a king bed, a large bedroom with two twin beds with a wall-to-wall divider panel and a bedroom with a queen bed. All beds are outfitted with light grey Frette duvet covers. Each bedroom also has its own private bathroom. The oceanfront master bedroom features terrace access and is furnished with a midnight blue rug, walk-in closet, side table with nightstand, high definition TV, and a sparkling chandelier. The master bathroom features imported marble flooring, a beautiful chandelier, double sinks, custom vanity area, bathtub, and glass-enclosed couples shower.

descriptions.description: Immerse yourself in the new “Post Beauty & Spa” wellness oasis for body and soul. Here you have a professional team for your very personal pampering program at your disposal.
